channel.title: [Hyperion]Rs2-474 Can't Login
channel.description:
Okay, I moved on to a new project and when ever I attempt to login I get this in the console but it doesn't log me in :(. [code]Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14978 object definitions. Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Jul 26, 2014 3:43:59 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 26, 2014 3:44:01 PM org.rs2server.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException cause-message : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject path : /list/gameObject line number : 2 ------------------------------- at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.rs2server.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:77) at org.rs2server.Server.main(Server.java:35) Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException cause-message : Cannot construct org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : org.rs2server.rs2.model.GameObject path : /list/gameObject line number : 2 ------------------------------- at How can I fix this problem, my client is set on ip "0.0.0.0" which is localhost.

item.title: [Hyperion]Rs2-474 Can't Login
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:19, topic:545398”]It works well on my computer. It’s currently uploading to mediafire ill edit this post with the link when it’s finished.

Use the same .cmd file. I don’t see why it doesnt work for you.

EDIT: Here’s the link https://www.mediafire.com/?47ugoi1odh15b7b[/quote]
Tysm :), works fine now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Rs2-474 Can't Login
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:13, topic:545398”][quote author=joeyscape link=topic=664282.msg4440558#msg4440558 date=1406497587]

Didn’t work with my source, im not sure if it has to do with the libs if it had to do with the libs wouldn’t you not even see a login request in the cmd?

It 100% has to do with the libs. The hyperion you’re using has XML files to store data. The xStream library is made for loading xml files. This huge and intimidating ‘error’ happens when the server isn’t able to load the XML files. The xStream libraries are out of date.

@ Dan - that isn’t how you properly fix it mate

Lol just looked at the code and it said cannot construct because it doesn’t have no args construcer. You could be wrong docent though he might be nesting a class or something.

It always says that, trust me i know how this works. It’s trying to create an object with no arguments because it can’t properly load it which leads back to xStream.

yeah must have to do with xstream, can you help me over teamviewer please?

http://xstream.codehaus.org/download.html
Download 1.4.7 Binary files. and put the all the jars u find into the libs folder. What does your run command look like?

@ECHO ON Title Hyperion @ECHO Rs2-Server 474 java -Xms512m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar org.rs2server.Server pause exit
[/quote]
Change it to:

@ECHO ON Title Hyperion @ECHO Rs2-Server 474 java -Xms512m -cp bin;lib/* org.rs2server.Server pause exit[/quote]

Still not working

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Rs2-474 Can't Login
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

joeyscape:

Didn’t work with my source, im not sure if it has to do with the libs if it had to do with the libs wouldn’t you not even see a login request in the cmd?

It 100% has to do with the libs. The hyperion you’re using has XML files to store data. The xStream library is made for loading xml files. This huge and intimidating ‘error’ happens when the server isn’t able to load the XML files. The xStream libraries are out of date.

@ Dan - that isn’t how you properly fix it mate

Read full topic
